kw.name: Open Browser And Application
kw.doc: Open browser and application

kw.name: Create Webdriver
kw.doc: Creates an instance of Selenium WebDriver.
kw.msg: Creating an instance of the Chrome WebDriver.

kw.name: Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.
kw.msg: Opening url 'https://www.makemytrip.com/'

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Title Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that the current page title equals ``title``.

arguments.arg: MakeMyTrip - #1 Travel Website 50% OFF on Hotels, Flights & Holiday

kw.msg: Page title is 'MakeMyTrip - #1 Travel Website 50% OFF on Hotels, Flights & Holiday'.

test.name: Verify Application Task bar items Fields

kw.name: Verify List Fields Using Locator
kw.doc: Verify list of fields by using locator

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Get Length
kw.doc: Returns and logs the length of the given item as an integer.
kw.msg: Length is 9
${field_count} = 9

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Verifying element '(//*[@class="chNavText darkGreyText"])[0+1]' contains exact text 'Flights'.

kw.name: Click Element

kw.doc: Fails if the given objects are unequal.

test.doc: Verify navigate from flight to hotels page.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Clicking element '//*[@data-cy="LoginHeaderText"]'.

kw.name: Page Should Contain
kw.doc: Verifies that current page contains ``text``.
kw.msg: Current page contains text 'Email or Mobile Number'.

kw.name: Page Should Contain Textfield
kw.doc: Verifies text field ``locator`` is found from current page.
kw.msg: Current page contains text field '//*[@id="username"]'.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.
